QuestData.Title: They Will Never Expect This...
QuestData.Description: They made a mistake by not killing me when they had the chance. Perhaps they thought Orkus would drown. HAH! Now they will pay the price for their carelessness.$B$BYou and I will tear this island apart, $n. They will never expect this! Once all of their soldiers are dead we will confront the leaders. Be on the lookout for attack plans. If we can get our hands on their plans we will be able to put a stop to their whole invasion!$B$BLet's go, $n!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Stormpike Dwarves and 8 Bloodfang Sentries on Purgation Isle.
QuestData.RewardText: Look upon the carnage, $n. You and I make quite the team!$B$BNow to find those plans and deal with their leaders.
